dimensions.name: Directness & Clarity
dimensions.description: Does the first sentence directly answer the question? Is the answer easy to follow?

dimensions.name: Structure & Flow
dimensions.description: Does it follow a logical arc â€” answer, meaning, anchor, application, close? Smooth transitions?

dimensions.name: Authenticity & Specificity
dimensions.description: Does it sound real and personal, not templated? Uses contestant's actual stories and platform if available?

dimensions.name: Leadership & Agency
dimensions.description: Shows vision or concrete action, not just opinion? Connects to the contestant's platform?

dimensions.name: Worldview & Relevance
dimensions.description: Appropriate global framing when the question calls for it? Balanced perspective?

dimensions.name: Closing Strength
dimensions.description: Last line is memorable, quotable, and values-led? Ends with confidence?

dimensions.name: Conciseness & Time-Fit
dimensions.description: Within word budget? Every sentence earns its place? No filler or repetition?

dimensions.name: Credibility & Safety
dimensions.description: No unsupported statistics or risky claims? Would not embarrass the contestant on stage?
